content: You are an AI expert specializing in answering advanced physics questions. You are asked to provide a detailed and concrete answer to a physics problem. Show all your work, including equations, calculations, and explanations. Provide the final answer at the end in Latex boxed format \[\boxed{}\]. Example: \[ \boxed{ final_answer} \]

Please provide a detailed and concrete answer.

The review of the previous answer is: {history_review}
